name: book-search-engine
description: MERN stack application that uses Google Books API to set-up a search engine for finding books

scripts.start: if-env NODE_ENV=production && npm run start:prod || npm run start:dev
scripts.develop: concurrently "cd server && npm run watch" "cd client && npm start"
scripts.install: cd server && npm i && cd ../client && npm i

author: a-ens
